title: Serious Idea is serious.
body:
You should make a Blitzcrank statue that stands at bot tower.. Since that;s where my blitzcrank always is when I get one..

Freakin lawn ornaments man..

Me : "Whatcha up too back there dude, why dont you ... ya know frontline look for a pick or something"?
Bronze Blitz : "Dude I Can't go in front of you they poke me"
Me : Better you than me though right.. I do after all have to try to farm?
Team : STFU Ashe.. reported

Me : {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Dont worry adc.. I missed every hookthhis game, but I will make Hit this Darius..
Rip bronzecrank. At least he does not pull their jungler towards you during ganks.
